资料字典 data dictionary，DADIC资料欺骗 data diddling资料数位声频带；DAT磁带 data digital audio tape.
数据欺诈(data diddling)是指在数据录入计算机过程中或录入之前,或从计算机系统输出数据时修改数据。对于最终录入计算机的数据而言,有其创建、记录、传输、解码、.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: probably from the name of Jeremy Diddler, a character in the farce Raising the Wind (1803) by the Irish dramatist James Kenney (1780–1849). Diddler constantly borrowed and failed to repay small sums of money: the name may have been based on an earlier verb diddle 'walk unsteadily, swerve'

entry.def: If someone diddles you, they take money from you dishonestly or unfairly.

example.ex: They diddled their insurance company by making a false claim.
example.tran: 他们进行虚假索赔，骗取了保险公司的赔偿金。

entry.def: If someone diddles, they waste time and do not achieve anything.

example.ex: ...if Congress were to just diddle around and not take any action at all.
example.tran: 如果国会只是想要闲混而不采取任何行动

sentences.sentence: "He swindled me out of my inheritance"
"She defrauded the customers who trusted her"
"the cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change"

means.word_mean: 2. manipulate manually or in one's mind or imagination;

sentences.sentence: "She played nervously with her wedding ring"
"He played with the idea of running for the Senate"
